about.profile:
I am an Associate Financial Consultant with AIA Singapore (SP-HUX) since 2015 with experience in both personal and commercial insurance. I joined in 2015 whilst I was still an undergraduate in NUS and I have since generated more than $1mil in revenue. I utilise the logical thinking imbued in me as a student of engineering to deliver sound financial advice to my clients.

Equipping myself with new skills in a variety of areas is something which I constantly do. Web development, machine learning algorithms, algorithmic trading, photography are some skills which I have taught myself through various platforms. I believe that constantly increasing my arsenal of skills and applying them in my life is the only way to thrive in today's fast-paced society.

qualifications.name:
M9 & M9A
Life Insurance
and Investment-Linked Policies

experiences.details:
Rising Star Award 2015
Million Dollar Club 2019 (Gold)

Designed the personal financial portfolio of over 150 clients
Generated over $1mil in revenue

Underwent rigorous training to be commissioned as a platoon commander for wartime and peacetime missions

Led a team of 20 soldiers to support security forces in various high-key events such as the IISS Shangri-la Dialogue 2013 and National Day Parade 2013
